title: Did you show this picture of Joe Biden with the big magician at KKK'?
subtitle: Following the first round of major democratic debates, social media users exchanged a very misleading and inaccurate idea targeting the former Vice-President.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A picture presented on social media in June 2019 showed former Vice President Joe Biden with the greatest magician of Ko Klux Klan.
